comments.message: Could not locate the assembly "FSharp.PowerPack, Version=1.9.6.8, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=a19089b1c74d0809". Check to make sure the assembly exists on disk. If this reference is required by your code, you may get compilation errors.

comments.author: lucabol
comments.message: Just delete the reference to the assembly from the project and add it again.
